name: Funky DonKey
description:
Game made for the 2020 GMTK.

A platformer where you do not have control when the character will jump or dash, he does it on the beat of the song. You can queue the actions, but be careful, if you accumulate too much funkyness this may get out of hand.

Controls: 

Move with Right and Left Arrow. 

Queue Jump -> S. 

Queue Dash -> D.

Queue Pose -> A.

Made by Christopher Sandoval and Daniel Gerendas

(Custom made art for the game)
